title: Comic book reading among young people in the UK 2015 , by demographic
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Demographics.
The Share of respondents is highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
There is a difference of 19.6 between the maximum Demographic Boys and minimum Demographic KS5.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Demographic, and Share of respondents in each Demographic on the y axis.
Demographic Boys has the highest Share of respondents and KS5 has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Demographics.
The Share of respondents is highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
There is a difference of 19.6 between the maximum Demographic Boys and minimum Demographic KS5.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Demographic .
There is a difference of 19.6 between the maximum Demographic Boys and minimum Demographic KS5.
Demographic Boys is higher than any other Demographics with value 34.0, followed by , and KS2. Down to Demographic KS5 with the lowest value 14.4.
The lowest value 14.4 at KS5 is almost 1.32 times smaller than the average value 25.68.
Summing up the values of all Demographics, we get total 256.8.
